verbs.description: When news about [ARG0: United States agents] [V: separating] [ARG1: immigrant children] [ARG2: from their parents] [ARGM-LOC: at the Texas border] [ARGM-LOC: under the Trump administration 's new zero - tolerance policy on illegal immigration] began to circulate widely last week , Willie Nelson spoke up quickly .
